English: A very good shield, with love from Hatsune Miku.
Chinese: 非常好防护罩，爱来自初音ミク。

English: Hatsune Shield
恋は戦争 (Koi wa Sensou)
Heals yourself for 50% of damage dealt.
ヴァンパイア (Vampire)
Increases attack power by 100% based on the number of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> stacks on yourself.
Chinese: 增加自己身上<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的攻击力。

English: 太陽系デスコ (Taiyoukei Disco)
Invincible

At the end of the turn, recover HP equal to the number of stacks.
After that, consume 1 stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.
Chinese:
回合结束时，恢复等量于层数的体力。
那之后，消耗1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

English: <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>
"Welcome to my concert! Today's setlist starts with..."
Chinese: 「欢迎来到我的演唱会！今天的曲目，就从……」

English: First Tone - At the start of battle, apply 2 stacks of Future Tone to all allies. Future Tone - At the end of the turn, recover HP equal to the number of stacks. After that, consume 1 stack of Future Tone. Chord X - Hatsune Miku's skills trigger additional effects when used on targets with X stacks of Future Tone. Harmony X - Additional effects trigger when Hatsune Miku has X stacks of Future Tone.
Chinese: 最初之音 - 战斗开始时，为所有队友施加2层未来之音。 未来之音 - 回合结束时，恢复等量于层数的体力。那之后，消耗1层未来之音。 音弦X - 初音未来的技能对拥有身上已有X层未来之音的角色释放会触发额外效果。 音律X - 初音未来身上有X层未来之音时会触发额外效果。

English: First Tone

Continuously uses songs to stack various buffs.
The more buffs, the stronger the healing effects.
With her powerful sense of rhythm, she brings the battle to its climax!
Chinese:
不断使用歌声叠加各种增益，
增益越多治疗效果越强，
以强大的音感将战斗推向最高潮！

English: Hatsune Miku
Add 1 "Leek" to your hand.
みくみくにしてあげる♪ (Miku Miku ni Shite Ageru♪)
Chinese: みくみくにしてあげる♪

English:
Remove 1 debuff.
Apply a shield equal to the number of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> stacks on the target.
Chinese:
解除1个负面状态。
施加等量与目标身上<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的防护罩。

English: 荒野と森と魔法の歌 (Kouya to Mori to Mahou no Uta)
Apply &a stacks of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> (100% of healing power).
メルト (Melt)
Apply <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> until the number of stacks matches the character on the field with the most <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> stacks.
Chinese: 施加<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，直到和场上拥有<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的角色层数相同为止。

English: アンノウン・マザーグース (Unknown Mother Goose)
Chinese: アンノウン・マザーグース

English: <color=#54FF9F>Chord 12</color> - Add 1 "Unknown Mother Goose" to your hand.
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦12</color> - 将1张“アンノウン・マザーグース”加入手卡。

English: ローリンガール (Rolling Girl)

Remove all pain and weakening debuffs, and apply 39 stacks of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.
After that, you die.
Chinese:
解除所有痛苦、弱化减益，施加39层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
那之后，自己死亡。

English: 初音ミクの消失 (Hatsune Miku no Shoushitsu)
*ワールドイズマイン (World is Mine)

No effect when used. While this skill is in your hand:
At the end of each turn, apply 2 stacks of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> to all allies.
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 3</color> - Apply an additional 2 stacks of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 9</color> - Deal &a damage to all enemies (number of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> stacks x 100% of healing power).
Chinese:
使用时没有效果。这个技能握在手中时：
每个回合结束时，为所有队友施加2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 额外施加2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 对所有敌人造成&a伤害(自身<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数 x 治疗力的100%)。

English: ワールドイズマイン (World is Mine)

Heal the ally with the lowest HP for &a (100% of healing power) and apply 1 stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.

<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 3</color> - Overheal yourself by 100% and gain 1 stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 9</color> - Cast again on a random enemy.
Chinese:
为己方HP最低的角色治疗&a(治疗力的100%)，施加1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 超额治疗自己100%，自身获得1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 对随机敌人再次释放一次。

English: ロミオとシンデレラ (Romeo to Cinderella)

For each stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> on yourself, critical rate increases by 10%. Additional critical rate: &a

<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 3</color> - For each stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> on yourself, deal 1 additional damage. Additional damage: &b
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 9</color> - Return this card to your hand.
Chinese:
自己身上每有1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，暴击率提升10%。额外暴击率：%a

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 自己身上每有1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，额外造成1伤害。额外伤害：%b
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 将这张卡放回手卡中。

English: 砂の惑星 (Suna no Wakusei)

For each enemy hit, gain 2 stacks of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.

<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 3</color> - Deal an additional &a damage (35% of attack power).
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 9</color> - Cast again.
Chinese:
每命中1个敌人，自身获得2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 额外造成&a伤害(攻击力的35%)。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 重复释放一次。

English: 千本桜 (Senbonzakura)
<color=#54FF9F>Chord 4</color> - Grant the target &a shield (80% of healing power).
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦4</color> - 赋予目标&a保护罩(治疗力的80%)。

English: こっち向いて Baby (Kocchi Muite Baby)
<color=#54FF9F>Chord 2</color> - Apply 1 additional stack of [Love is War].
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦2</color> - 额外施加1层[恋は戦争]。

English: 恋は戦争 (Koi wa Sensou)
ヴァンパイア (Vampire)
太陽系デスコ (Taiyoukei Disco)

Add 1 skill from the discard pile to your hand.
Gain a number of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color> stacks equal to its cost.

<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 3</color> - Reduce the cost of that skill by 1.
<color=#00FFFF>Harmony 9</color> - Reduce the cost of that skill by 10.
Chinese:
从弃牌堆将1个技能加入手卡。
自己获得其费用相同的<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 使那个技能费用降低1点。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 使那个技能费用降低10点。

English: 深海少女 (Shinkai Shoujo)
あなたの歌姫 (Anata no Utahime)
Draw 1 skill. Add 2 "Leek" to your hand.
Chinese: 抽取1个技能。将2个[大葱]加入手卡。

English: Ievan Polkka

Draw 1 skill.
<color=#54FF9F>Chord 1</color> - Apply 1 additional stack of <color=#7FFFD4>Future Tone</color>.
Chinese:
抽取1个技能。
<color=#54FF9F>音弦1</color> - 额外施加1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

English: Leek
